name: MEDDPICC
description: Enterprise sales qualification framework: Metrics, Economic Buyer, Decision Criteria, Decision Process, Paper Process, Identify Pain, Champion, Competition.

questions: What is the measurable impact we can drive?
How will this be quantified post-implementation?
Have we spoken to them directly?
What criteria will the customer use to evaluate solutions?
Are we aligned to those priorities?
What are the formal steps in the buying process?
Who signs off and in what order?
What does the legal/procurement timeline look like?
Are there standard contracts or compliance reviews?
What business problem is being solved?
Is it urgent, visible, and budgeted for?
Who wins internally if this goes live?
Are they actively selling us internally?
How do we stack up against them?
